message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $90. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $85 for the product. I hope this works for you.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $85. I can offer you a compromise at $92, which is a great deal for you. Let me know if you're interested!
I understand your position, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $87 for the product. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

I'm glad we're still in the negotiation, Bob. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway. I can offer you $90, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final counteroffer. Let me know if you're interested!
